title: "We have restored this installation to an older version of LoL. Now we'll try to patch.."
body: This happened as I was loading into a Ranked game and will penalize me...I cant even log in?

replies.body: Got the "we have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends" error after play AR URF. Restarted client and I click ok on that error and get "There was a problem patching League. We'll restore a backup version" error. I hit restart and it goes back to the other error. Idk what to do anymore. Hextech tool doesnt work because it cant find my LeagueClient.exe file.

This is also happened to me in when I opened up league. I am in a endless loop of "we have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends" into "There was a problem patching League. We'll restore a backup version" and repeat. I tried Hextech tool as well but it did not do anything.
Same here. Looks like URF broke the game {{champion:115}}
Same happened to me and searching for what to do.
same
Same Here
Anyone figure out a solution?
This is also happening to me
Mee too :V
I had to reinstall LoL completly, but it looks like it works now.

k, ignore that one, it will start patching again ._.
guess we have to wait {{champion:122}}

I got a temp solution by setting my pc's clock back like 12 hours. i don't know if it'll fix the problem completely but It worked for now
 I saw it posted further down cred goes to someone else in this thread
same here :/
same... guess we need riot to fix anything
GUYS IM IN!!!!!!!!!!! {{champion:17}}

OK so its not only me. Post the solution if anyone finds out how. I NEED MORE URF TIME D:
try setting the clock of your pc back :) it got me out of the loop to where I can log in. I dont think it fixes the problem, I have yet to have it start again though

oh okay im not the only one having issues right now
hope they will fix it soon :c
Has anyone tried the solutions tried in the past? How'd that go?
I've tried 3 so far. No luck!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
maybe we should just wait for rito to fix it

I just tried the solution in this post and now the client doesn't start up, even after restoring everything to before. I just get a popup telling me to reinstall league. So i did that and now the new league client loops in a "An unspecified error has occurred. Please check the logs for more information."

I'd say hold off until they fix it on their end.

Im not sure but i think riot is on it if you open the client it'll show a message at the top left corner where the red i icon is and it says that they are aware of login issues and are working on a fix. not sure if its this one though but i think it is
same just now!!
I'm kinda triggerd{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i wanted to try reapir tool but i cant because there is is one error and after that there is error who exits your client so you can't even press the repair tool...
Yeah this has never happened before, but it just did and I can't play.

Ah, I've seen this a few times, and it's mentioned in our Update Client Known Issues post. You can resolve it with the steps below:

1. Delete your \RADS\solutions\league_client_sln folder if one exists in your League install

2. Delete all but your "installer" folder in \RADS\projects\league_client\releases directory

3. Run \RADS\projects\league_client\releases\installer\deploy\LeagueClient.exe

Let me know if this worked!
Where is this at?? I can't find this folder.

It's not called the "Installer" folder anymore. My folder was called 0.0.0.74 - but contained the \deploy\Leagueclient.exe subdirectory

Basically I didn't have to do step 2, and ran the file in \RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.74\deploy\LeagueClient.exe

This issue was caused by me trying to load into a game while I had another game open full screen. Hextech repair tool did not do anything for me unfortunately.
i dont have a instalelr folder what can i do?
UPVOTE!! THIS DID IT FOR ME.  THANK YOU KIND SIR :)

This was the fix! Thank you very much :)

(Do step 1 and then step 3)
Mac: Open Finder, Applications, right click League of Legends, show package content and then follow steps.
Just happened to me too. It doesn't seem to be updating or anything it's just sitting in the login screen. And I'm in a ranked game too.
force repatch doesnt do anything

so i uninstalled the pbe to fix it and i reinstall it back and there was a error that poped up it would not let me reinstall it because it was wanting to go into a different file location so i changed it to home and it worked and when it reinstalled back on my pc it worked just a little fyi the date it happen to me was on the 1/1/17 idk how to fix it so i thought about uninstallingit to see if it works out for me and it did
